languages.text: {n}Старуха деловито вскидывает дробовик.{/n} "А мы и рады послужить. Порядок в доме наводить — благое дело, Ваша Светлость. Зря вы нам, что ли, оружие {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_GaveWeapons}пожаловали{/d}? Привел к нам Бывалый — странный такой, тихий, — значит, каких-то голубчиков, начали они ересь нести всякую, рассказывать, какие мы все угнетенные да обездоленные. К бунту, видите ли, призывать пытались. Вот мы им головушки и посносили".

{n}The old woman raises her shotgun.{/n} "And we're eager to serve. One must keep one's house in order, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and you {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_GaveWeapons}gave us weapons{/d} for a reason! So, Stager came to us all quiet, and he brought some lads along with him. They started talking, telling us how oppressed and deprived we all were. They tried to incite rebellion, you see? And so, we blew their heads off."
languages.original_text: {n}Старуха деловито вскидывает дробовик.{/n} "А мы и рады послужить. Порядок в доме наводить — благое дело, Ваша Светлость. Зря вы нам, что ли, оружие {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_GaveWeapons}пожаловали{/d}? Привел к нам Бывалый — странный такой, тихий, — значит, каких-то голубчиков, начали они ересь нести всякую, рассказывать, какие мы все угнетенные да обездоленные. К бунту, видите ли, призывать пытались. Вот мы им головушки и посносили".

traits.locale_text: {n}The old woman raises her shotgun.{/n} "And we're happy to serve. One needs keep their house in order, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_GaveWeapons}gave us weapons{/d} for a reason! So Stager came to us all quiet, and brought along some lads. They started to talk heresy, telling us how oppressed and deprived we all were. They tried to incite rebellion, you see, so we blew their heads right off."

{n}The old woman raises her shotgun.{/n} "And we're happy to serve. One needs keep their house in order, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They started to talk heresy, telling us how oppressed and deprived we all were. They tried to incite rebellion, you see, so we blew their heads right off."

{n}The old woman raises her shotgun.{/n} "And we're eager to serve. One must keep one's house in order, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and you {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_GaveWeapons}gave us weapons{/d} for a reason! So, Stager came to us all quiet, and he brought some lads along with him. They started talking, telling us how oppressed and deprived we all were. They tried to incite rebellion, you see? And so, we blew their heads off."

languages.text: {n}La anciana levanta la escopeta.{/n} «Y estamos más que dispuestos a servir. Tenemos que tener la casa en orden, mi{mf|lord|lady}, ¡y {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_GaveWeapons}nos dio armas{/d} para algo! De modo que Stager vino en silencio con unos muchachos. Empezaron a hablar, a decirnos lo oprimidos y maltratados que estábamos. Intentaban incitar a la rebelión, ¿entiende? Así que les volamos la cabeza».
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman raises her shotgun.{/n} "And we're eager to serve. One must keep one's house in order, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and you {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_GaveWeapons}gave us weapons{/d} for a reason! So, Stager came to us all quiet, and he brought some lads along with him. They started talking, telling us how oppressed and deprived we all were. They tried to incite rebellion, you see? And so, we blew their heads off."

traits.locale_text: {n}La anciana levanta la escopeta.{/n} «Y estamos más que dispuestos a servir. Tenemos que tener la casa en orden, mi{mf|lord|lady}, ¡y {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_GaveWeapons}nos dio armas{/d} para algo! De modo que Stager vino en silencio con unos muchachos. Empezaron a hablar, a decirnos lo oprimidos y maltratados que estábamos. Intentaban incitar a la rebelión, ¿entiende? Así que les volamos la cabeza».

languages.text: {n}老婆はショットガンを構える。{/n}「私たちは、お勤めすることを熱望しています。家の秩序は守らなければなりません、陛下。そして{d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_GaveWeapons}武器を手に取った{/d}のには理由があります！ステージャーは静かに私たちのところに、数名の若者を連れてきました。彼らは口を開き、私たちがいかに抑圧され、奪われているかを話し始めたのです。反乱を煽ろうとしていた。どうなったか分かります？私たちは、彼らの頭を吹き飛ばしたんです」
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman raises her shotgun.{/n} "And we're eager to serve. One must keep one's house in order, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and you {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_GaveWeapons}gave us weapons{/d} for a reason! So, Stager came to us all quiet, and he brought some lads along with him. They started talking, telling us how oppressed and deprived we all were. They tried to incite rebellion, you see? And so, we blew their heads off."

traits.locale_text: {n}老婆はショットガンを構える。{/n}「私たちは、お勤めすることを熱望しています。家の秩序は守らなければなりません、陛下。そして{d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_GaveWeapons}武器を手に取った{/d}のには理由があります！ステージャーは静かに私たちのところに、数名の若者を連れてきました。彼らは口を開き、私たちがいかに抑圧され、奪われているかを話し始めたのです。反乱を煽ろうとしていた。どうなったか分かります？私たちは、彼らの頭を吹き飛ばしたんです」

languages.text: {n}老妇人举起了手中的霰弹枪。{/n}“而我们很渴望为您服务，大人。我们必须得把自己的家打理得井井有条，而且您还{d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_GaveWeapons}给我们分发了武器{/d}！斯塔格偷偷摸摸地来找过我们，还带了好几个小伙子一起来。他们想给我们洗脑，说我们受到了压迫、剥削什么什么的，还打算煽动叛乱，这像话吗？于是我们几枪打爆了他们的脑袋。”
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman raises her shotgun.{/n} "And we're eager to serve. One must keep one's house in order, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and you {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_GaveWeapons}gave us weapons{/d} for a reason! So, Stager came to us all quiet, and he brought some lads along with him. They started talking, telling us how oppressed and deprived we all were. They tried to incite rebellion, you see? And so, we blew their heads off."

traits.locale_text: {n}老妇人举起了手中的霰弹枪。{/n}“而我们很渴望为您服务，大人。我们必须得把自己的家打理得井井有条，而且您还{d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_GaveWeapons}给我们分发了武器{/d}！斯塔格偷偷摸摸地来找过我们，还带了好几个小伙子一起来。他们想给我们洗脑，说我们受到了压迫、剥削什么什么的，还打算煽动叛乱，这像话吗？于是我们几枪打爆了他们的脑袋。”

languages.text: {n}Die alte Frau reckt ihre Schrotflinte in die Luft.{/n} "Und wir sind begierig, zu dienen. Man muss Ordnung in seinem Haus halten, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, und Ihr habt uns ja nicht umsonst {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_GaveWeapons}Waffen gegeben{/d}! Also, Alter Hase ist zu uns geschlichen gekommen, mit ein paar Burschen im Schlepptau. Sie haben angefangen zu reden, haben uns erzählt, wie unterdrückt und benachteiligt wir alle sind. Sie haben versucht, eine Rebellion anzuzetteln, versteht Ihr? Also haben wir ihnen die Köpfe weggepustet."
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman raises her shotgun.{/n} "And we're eager to serve. One must keep one's house in order, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and you {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_GaveWeapons}gave us weapons{/d} for a reason! So, Stager came to us all quiet, and he brought some lads along with him. They started talking, telling us how oppressed and deprived we all were. They tried to incite rebellion, you see? And so, we blew their heads off."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die alte Frau reckt ihre Schrotflinte in die Luft.{/n} "Und wir sind begierig, zu dienen. Man muss Ordnung in seinem Haus halten, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, und Ihr habt uns ja nicht umsonst {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_GaveWeapons}Waffen gegeben{/d}! Also, Alter Hase ist zu uns geschlichen gekommen, mit ein paar Burschen im Schlepptau. Sie haben angefangen zu reden, haben uns erzählt, wie unterdrückt und benachteiligt wir alle sind. Sie haben versucht, eine Rebellion anzuzetteln, versteht Ihr? Also haben wir ihnen die Köpfe weggepustet."

languages.text: {n}La doyenne lève son arme.{/n} « Et nous, on a qu'une envie : servir. C'est important de garder sa maison en ordre, Votre Seigneurie, et si vous nous avez {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_GaveWeapons}donné des armes{/d}, c'est pas pour rien ! Alors, quand Stager est venu nous voir avec quelques-uns de ces hommes, là, et qu'ils se sont mis à causer comme quoi on était vachement oppressés, quand même, et qu'on pouvait pas continuer à vivre comme ça privés de tout, on a tout de suite compris qu'ils voulaient nous pousser à la rébellion. Du coup, on leur a explosé la tronche. »
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman raises her shotgun.{/n} "And we're eager to serve. One must keep one's house in order, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and you {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_GaveWeapons}gave us weapons{/d} for a reason! So, Stager came to us all quiet, and he brought some lads along with him. They started talking, telling us how oppressed and deprived we all were. They tried to incite rebellion, you see? And so, we blew their heads off."

traits.locale_text: {n}La doyenne lève son arme.{/n} « Et nous, on a qu'une envie : servir. C'est important de garder sa maison en ordre, Votre Seigneurie, et si vous nous avez {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_GaveWeapons}donné des armes{/d}, c'est pas pour rien ! Alors, quand Stager est venu nous voir avec quelques-uns de ces hommes, là, et qu'ils se sont mis à causer comme quoi on était vachement oppressés, quand même, et qu'on pouvait pas continuer à vivre comme ça privés de tout, on a tout de suite compris qu'ils voulaient nous pousser à la rébellion. Du coup, on leur a explosé la tronche. »

languages.text: {n}Yaşlı kadın, pompalısını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Hizmet etmek istiyoruz. Karşılaştığımız sorunları çözmeliyiz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Bize boşa {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_GaveWeapons}silah vermediniz{/d} ya! Eski Toprak, sinsi sinsi gelip yanında birkaç oğlan getirdi. Sonra konuşmaya başladılar, ne kadar baskı gördüğümüzü ve fakir olduğumuzu falan söylediler. İsyan çıkarmaya çalışıyorlardı işte. Biz de kellelerini uçurduk."
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman raises her shotgun.{/n} "And we're eager to serve. One must keep one's house in order, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and you {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_GaveWeapons}gave us weapons{/d} for a reason! So, Stager came to us all quiet, and he brought some lads along with him. They started talking, telling us how oppressed and deprived we all were. They tried to incite rebellion, you see? And so, we blew their heads off."
